website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof cloth material makes up this inexpensive and effective high chair mat.
pros: Material has a nice  good quality feel
Will hold the water on top after spills
Can be thrown in the washing machine
Lined so wet messes will not soak through the mat
cons: Not a very large mat at 42" x 42" square
Not a mat to stay on the floor all of the time

customer_reviews.title: There are better brands
customer_reviews.text: For just 3$ more you can buy a thinker strongr splat mat. The. Cinderella print is cute but it is disposable table cloth thin with an added binding. I have added a picture of my other splat mat so you can see the quality difference
customer_reviews.author: Airielafleur

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 90 seconds after spreading this thing out, my daughter pulled down the entire can of sliced pears from the table and onto the floor. The liquid just puddled on top instead of seeping into our student-apartment carpet! It does bunch up when you try and move the high chair on top of it, but if you just pick up the chair it’s not a problem to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hess

customer_reviews.title: A fine product. Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute cute pattern selection. Looks nice. Got it because for whatever reason, our dining room is carpeted. Yes it will be a project to fix that. But for now, the mat. Wish it was a little larger, and a little thicker or heavier. The former, because even if my baby isn’t actively throwing food (no mat is big enough for that), sometimes food hits the carpet. The latter, because it does scrunch and bunch fairly easily. I’d like it if it stayed in place just a little better. But, a fine product all around, it doesn’t claim anything untrue. Just some thoughts for making it better.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: The material was easy for me to clean and still is
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were a way to attach it to the base of the stroller or something. If my dog is walking around the high chair he moves the mat sometimes and we don't notice so food ends up on our hardwood. The material was easy for me to clean and still is. It is a hassle sometimes to have to lay it out each time she eats. Would be great if it came with a pouch you can attach to the base of back of the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: BFab28

customer_reviews.title: This mat is not as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: This mat is not as good as I thought it would be. It does collect food and liquids and it is cute, but there is no way to keep it in place so it moves every time I move the high chair. It is also very slippery. It does not cover as much area as I was thinking it would. It works well for food that is accidentally dropped right off the chair but if your toddler is an average toddler and flings food in every direction, you will need something bigger. I want this mat to work but I am not creative enough to figure out how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: slt165

customer_reviews.title: Must have for carpeted homes with a toddler
customer_reviews.text: We have carpet even in our dining space and this has come in handy everyday since we’ve got it. I recommend having more than one. It’s easy to clean, we just wipe with a paper towel and when it gets really soiled we throw it in the washer on cold and tumble dry low. I’ve washed it numerous times and it’s still going strong. Can’t recommend this enough
customer_reviews.author: Chaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves painting with watercolors and playing with play doh. I usually make those two activities a very special treat because I don't like dealing with the mess. This splat mat has made it so easy for me to deal with the mess associated with these activities that my daughter enjoys so much. She has spilled a ton of dirty water color water on this mat over our coffee table and the table comes out completely dry in the end. I don't know why it took me so long to buy this! I also love that it has Mickey too!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B

customer_reviews.title: Simplifies the clean up process
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase and wishing I'd bought it as soon as my son started eating solids. The mat makes cleaning up so simple - I pick up bigger pieces of food from it for the compost, shake the crumbs off of it outside, and throw it in the washing machine every few days. It totally beats looking for every sticky spot on our floor after every meal. When we no longer need it for under the high chair, it can totally be repurposed (like under an easel). I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Q

customer_reviews.title: Makes clean up from dinner easy
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for under a high chair! my 1 year old throws food everywhere when he eats at literally every meal and this mat saves my sanity. It catches all his food mess and it's totally waterproof. At the end of a meal I can just pick it up and shake the food off. You can also easily throw it in the washer as needed. Water doesn't get through and it is big enough to cover a large area under a high chair. I can also see it being very functional for crafts like painting since it's waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Protects floor & machine washable
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can machine wash this mat and it is waterproof. The mat keeps the floor beneath clean and dry. When it gets too soiled it can be thrown in the washing machine and tumbled dry. We have another mat that has to be wiped off and I am sure that eventually I will be replacing with a Bumkins mat. It just doesn't feel as clean/ sanitary to just be wiping clean.
customer_reviews.author: DKCM6124

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a month and really wanted to like it. The problem is I just don’t. It’s super thin and silky material. It IS NOT good for carpets at all. It doesn’t stay in place and it slips everywhere. It’s worked okay for it’s purpose but with how much it moves on the floor, I still have to vacuum up messes. The only upside to this one is that it is machine washable and can be dried. Spend a little more and get a better quality mat
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really basic mat, but for the price it does it's job. Positive: Machine washable, or you can take it outside and hose it off. Lightweight Easily folded and stored. Wipe clean material Cons: No sticking adhesive or anything on the bottom, so the high chair holds it in place primarily. If you have a child with a good throwing arm, it may miss the mat lol.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable and machine washable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! They are very cute, the perfect size to put under the highchair, and easy to fold up. They did not stain when my daughter got her carrots all over them, and when she got her teething biscuits stuck to them, they were very easy to throw in the wash. I would highly recommend getting one of these if you are planning on doing baby led weaning, it will save you a ton of cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Janet I.

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mat! It was exactly what i was looking for! The only issue is that there’s no weights/way for the corners to stay down on the floor. I am going to buy some cheap Velcro to attach it! Other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: MamaKay

customer_reviews.title: What a boon!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a savior! Loved my new splat mat. My child always got irritated why mamma is picking up my food if I am dropping on the floor coz I can’t see the mess. Slowly and gradually he stopped eating on his high chair. I had to take him on my arms and feed him. So tiring. Recently, I bought this mat. I am not worried now about any splits or food pieces on the mat now. My kiddo again started to eat on high chair and drops little. I am in love with this mat now.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely slippery when walked on especially if a piece folds over. There is pretty much no grip on the bottom so can easily fold over creating opportunities for many falling accidents. Our son’s grandmother almost fell over multiple times because of this product. It’s simply not large enough to fit a standard high chair. We have the beyond abie and it barely catches the fold baby throws.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Machine Washable & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Most of our living space is carpeted, including the dining room. We don't travel with it very often but it packs up easily when we're not using it. Pros: Machine washable Has not held a stain Dries quickly Wipes down easily between washes Cons: Could be larger, the older child has become, the further out the food radius gets
customer_reviews.author: Emily Igawa

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for this price point - but the description is completely inaccurate. This is NOT waterproof, it is at best, water resistant. I bought this for puppy accidents on an area rug, the pee seeped through this in less than the 3 minutes it took me to recognize it was there & clean it up. It wipes up nicely, but again, not waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather202

customer_reviews.title: Finally a way to keep area clean.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE!!!!!! Use for visiting grandchildren. During movies, or picnic times in my smaller living space. Saves my carpet from crumbs, bits of food, spills and accidents. Encourages twins (4years) to use napkins instead of carpet and clothes for foody fingers. Just pick up the four corners and shake into rubbish. Washable, air dry. Folds up compact for g-kid bin. Probably buy one for my vehicle back seat for Nana pick up drop off duty😉 to go under boosters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, easy wipe down
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They're a nice fabric that wipes up easily and a good design that blends nicely in my dining room. I wish they were a bit bigger, my twins seem to drop their spoons in quite a radius around their high chairs, but these are better than any of the alternatives. A little bit pricey for what is essentially a drop cloth, but worth it to not have to be doing deep carpet cleaning on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: k.a.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great splat mat!
customer_reviews.text: This splat mat really does its job and I love the Mickey print! My daughter's high chair has a rail in the back so we just fold this up and drape it over along with her bibs, so it's always at the ready when meal time comes. We just gather it up after she's finished eating and shake off the food in the trash or kitchen sink. It's large enough to cover her drop zone so our floors stay clean. The material is thin, so if you had to bring this with you somewhere it doesn't take up much room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: alk11

customer_reviews.title: Buy two so you have one while in the wash
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for catching all that falls from my toddler’s high chair. Dump out crumbs in the trash and then throw in the washing machine to start it all over again. Only thing that would make it better is to have weighted edges, since it can be pulled up easily on the ground by said toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Protect your floor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a catch may for the little spills that don’t clean up normally without the mat. It cleans up well with just a damp cloth and/or paper towels. If you get annoyed by pasta sauce stains, the mat it machine washable. We also use it for pizza/movie nights picnic in the living room. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jdotrico

customer_reviews.title: Good dimensions and material
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats, they are so easy to clean with a mini toddler to always drops food or play with food and get it on the floor. Has great coverage and I like the pattern. This is my second time buying. It last me about a year, just enough time for my kid to grow out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon V.

customer_reviews.title: Best Splat Mat
customer_reviews.text: We love this splat mat! It is the perfect size to go under our daughter's IKEA high chair. It is extremely waterproof and protects our dining room rug from spills. We chose the gray chevron pattern, so it camouflages the mess well. It is easy to fold up and throw in the wash. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R

customer_reviews.title: Very cute may. Great size. Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this. We use it under a small table set on medium pile carpeting in our playroom/sunroom. It slipped far too much because of the carpet, so we laid a couple of pieces of carpet protector (sticky clear rubber we had leftover from a recent move) around the edges directly on the carpet and it stays put amazingly. Easy to wipe or hand vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this, for the first couple weeks it worked really well and all the mess stayed on it. Now it’s like our little guy has taken it as a personal challenge to throw it past the mat... so I wish it was a bit bigger. However, realistically I think it’s as big as it can be, otherwise you are just covering your whole table area in a mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this the mat deprecated and my thought was” we used plastic picnic tablecloths when my kids were babies for .99 cents”! The mat separates which made it easy to slip on along with the highchair moved, then it ripped... I was disappointed and not my favorite. I will go and buy a plastic picnic table cover for the floor for a buck.
customer_reviews.author: Buying grandma

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Easy to clean, just shake off and throw in the wash. Durable, we have 2 and wash them probably 3-4 times a week, and the mats have held up great for going on 4 months. My only wish is that they were a bit bigger. My Baby Led Weaning girl makes quite the mess and this doesn’t catch it all. I still end up wiping up the floor, but this definitely catches the bulk of it. Bumpkins! Please make an XL version, like 54”x54”, and you will have made a true 5-Star product!!
customer_reviews.author: Miel

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy for what it is, but we would definitely purchase it again. I’m able to pick it up after each meal and shake it off outside which prevents me having to get on my hands and knees to clean up after every single meal. It’s not huge, so food often makes it past the mat, but my dog usually takes care of that, lol. I considered buying a cheap tablecloth, but I’m glad I just coughed up the cash for this one since I can wash and dry it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to clean, easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I carry this in our daughter's diaper bag to go over to other's houses where she'll eat and also to restaurants. I thought this would have ripped by now after the number of times a chair has been scooted over it, but it's hanging in there and not showing abnormal wear. Great for keeping carpet clean under a highchair.
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been so handy! It keeps messes from the kitchen rug and is so easily movable. The baby loves to play with it and the cats love to lay on it - so many uses! I can just take it outside and shake it off if it gets messy and then throw it in the washing machine. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Good as a table cloth; not as a floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for under table and high chair, but it’s so slippery, it won’t stay put. We use it as a table cover when my child wants to play with messy toys or paint. Cleans nicely, and can be washed. But not as a floor mat.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: This splat mat is easy to clean and does not look horrible in our ...
customer_reviews.text: This splat mat is easy to clean and does not look horrible in our dining area. We have now purchased two. The only complaint is that the mat gets a slight stain/coloring when sauces (pasta, salsa, etc) come in contact with it. So far no cleaner has been able to wipe it thoroughly clean but thankfully it does wash out mostly in the laundry. We have used this product for about a year now so overall I would say it has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: J Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles up with any movement
customer_reviews.text: This mat is too light. It's nearly impossible to keep it flat on the ground. It is always wrinkling up when the high chair gets moved or the baby crawls on it. This makes it look bad and have a smaller surface area to catch falling food. I am replacing this with one that is weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Blindman

customer_reviews.title: It’s works well and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Wish it was a little heavier maybe (but there is advantage to it being light in cleaning shaking things off). Wish it was a little heavier as it can bunch up easily under the baby high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Raj S

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years o daily use, no stains nor tears!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to “survive” BLW (baby led weaning) and after 2 years, we still use it. Thankfully my toddler now spills less food on the carpet, but it’s still a cleaning life saver. We also use it as a mat while doing artwork.
customer_reviews.author: rossc264

customer_reviews.title: moves all over it just seemed like it was more work than just cleaning my hard ...
customer_reviews.text: moves all over it just seemed like it was more work than just cleaning my hard wood floor. if I bought something like this again for under the highchair id go with something like a thick rubber mat or something.. I returned it bc id rather just wipe or sweep under the seat and call it a day!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice quality mat that washes well and is a nice size, but it tends to bunch up when you move around the high chair because there is no grip on the bottom... it just slides around the floor. Would love to see one that has some kind of suction or grip for those of us who have hardwood or laminate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: r0chelle67

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mat
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat. It has prevented many accidents. Nothing leaks through and it really easy to clean in the wash. It also doesn't wrinkle after the wash and it will lay flat again.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalKitsune

customer_reviews.title: A must have item
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use this as a dog feeding mat and it’s so much easier to clean after they finish their meal. A big plus is that it dries out in a matter of minutes. Thank you for a great item. !!!
customer_reviews.author: MOR.N

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, but needs a grip on the bottom to keep from sliding
customer_reviews.text: This is really helpful and a must have with small children. The only complaint that I have is that I wish that it had something that grips in the bottom because this comes up off of the floor and slides easily
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Goo catcher for under baby's highchair!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It is made of the same lightweight material as the Bumpkins bibs. Very easy to use. Very easy to spot clean by hand, or machine wash. It can be packed into baby's bag! I gave up all my DIY methods (small plastic tablecloth, old shower curtain, etc.) because the Bumpkins mat is an exemplary product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Miccio

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Dry messes shake off easily in the sink, and wet messes wipe off with a tag. Some things (like tomato sauce) leave a little tinge or get too messy to be worth wiping, and then we throw it in the wash. It's the same material as the 'laminated' bibs we have. It does just fine in the washer/dryer (buy two, so you can use one while the other is in the wash). Way easier than picking food up off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: VTS

customer_reviews.title: Well priced.  Not as large or stiff as $30 ones, but also half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice, modern design. Not as ugly as most, and even ha an adult like pattern Nice and lightweight Rolls up easy and small. Foldable. Neutral: Mid-tier price point Cons: A little flimsy Doesn't cover as large an are as some.
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: This was way smaller than I thought. I put it underneath our high chair and it wouldn’t stay flat and kept getting caught in the wheels. I sent it back. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: AmazonObsessed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I looked at A LOT of splash mats. This one isn't huge like most. It fits in the small space I have on the floor. Easy to wipe and up and fold up multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Teh

customer_reviews.title: Cute Mickey Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the mickey mouse mat. Quality is pretty good, makes it pretty easy to clean. Though I would have expected the mat to be little big. Giving 4 stars for smaller than usual size.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Use under pet cage
customer_reviews.text: I use this under our rat cage - as they seem to like to potty in the corner from a shelf above - and as a result some gets out of cage. Has been great for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Effectively contains messes
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this mat for us because my sister has two and she likes them. It is a good product to help make toddler messes more contained. I would not buy it for myself because it seems superfluous, but it is a good gift and we use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: H. Dingui

customer_reviews.title: Protecting my hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my hardwood floors. They're old and aren't as sealed as they used to be. This sheet works great and is easy to wipe clean and wash in the washing machine. I've dragged the highchair across many times and still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Keeps table clean for crafts/art with kids
customer_reviews.text: We use it on our table during crafts/art time. So far so good. Keeps the table clean and provides a nice workspace for toddlers. Nice, fun patterns.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gets bunches up under the high chairs frequently but other than that it works great. Easy to clean and withstanding the high chair wheels without tearing so far. I’ve been using them for about a month and I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we have a messy toddler and a baby on the way. It looks small in the picture, but is actually a good size. It helps to catch the crumbs my toddler loves to create and helps keep our floor clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and thin.
customer_reviews.text: This splat mat is very thin and is really slippery. I need to fold it and move it after every use. It cleans off easy enough but I was hoping I could leave it down between each feeding after I clean it. Even I found it to be slippery and my kiddo only has bare feet around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: I love My New Table cloth.
customer_reviews.text: I love Cinderella. I am all about Cinderella. This table cover is adorable. I wish it was the original Cinderella but still cute as can be. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping this could work as a catch-all under our ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this could work as a catch-all under our Inglesina fast chair.. reality is that the fabric is way too thin and flimsy, resulting in spilling even more as we tried to clean up messes. Ended up throwing this away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want to scrub and wash your floor after each meal, use this!
customer_reviews.text: I Never invested in a splat mat when my daughter was younger but now that she’s a messy toddler I can’t live without it! It’s perfect in regards to size, material and ease of cleaning. It goes right under her seat and collects all of her mess. The material is waterproof so I can wipe it with a sponge, rinse in the sink or just throw it in the washing machine. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria F

customer_reviews.title: Great but wish it was slightly bigger
customer_reviews.text: Adorable print and lightweight (I toss it in my diaper bag to take on picnics in lieu of a blanket). For toddlers who like to toss food off their high chairs this isn’t big enough to catch it all. My son will drop a yogurt directly off the side of his high chair and typically this may will only catch about half of the spill. Wish it was 1.5 the size it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleya Geefay

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large table not for you but it does do a good job covering half of the table but kind of slips around
customer_reviews.author: Krista Lacey

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea and print of this mat
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea and print of this mat, however it's very light and there's nothing to keep it from bunching if you briefly brush past it. I couldn't keep it on the ground and it became too flimsy to keep out and use. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but small.
customer_reviews.text: It is on the smaller side and didn’t really cover the surface area needed for my 1 year old. It does wash easy and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Thin, foldable and easy wipe
customer_reviews.text: It’s thin and easily foldable. Wipable surface. Big enough to cover foods that fall. Thrown foods are another story 🙈 This will save my floors!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I own two
customer_reviews.text: This is a great splat mat. Wipes up really easily. Throw it in the washing machine when it needs it. Dries in the dryer. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Springtime10

customer_reviews.title: great floor mat
customer_reviews.text: easy to lay down and clean it up and throw in the laundry! Such a cute pattern and have the smock to match it!
customer_reviews.author: hovey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful floor protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. When food hits the floor it gets stuck. When food hits this mat it just wipes up. We love this addition to our meal times. Does make a ceramic tile floor a little slick if stepped on. Rq
customer_reviews.author: Langebm

customer_reviews.title: Good if your chair doesn’t move.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but hard to slide a high chair on it because it’s really thin. It’s really big. Probably too big.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cons in handy
customer_reviews.text: It has come in handy for my daughter's messy meals. If you got a messy eater I would definitely grab one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Love this, thin, light, comfortable to walk on because it feels like cloth, but it is coated on the backside to be waterproof. Easy to pick up and dump all the crumbs into the sink after a meal. Just wish they had a larger size to accommodate 2 chairs.
customer_reviews.author: MaryK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for messy activities!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this mat! It’s nice and durable and a great size to set up our toddler with crayons/paints on the floor. I love how the back of the material makes it stick a little bit to the floor so it doesn’t slip around too easily! Easy to wipe clean and folds up ice and small for storage. Plus- LOVE the cactus pattern!
customer_reviews.author: T. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: A trusted friend
customer_reviews.text: I love my bumkins splash mat. I use it for everything. I take it with me everywhere. At night I don’t know, I,m sleeping, but invthe day time, I really do use the splash mat
customer_reviews.author: A Slice of Ham

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed having a mat under the high chair. I clean it in the sink and let it air dry daily. After a few days it begins to smell. So then I have to machine wash it. That part is pretty annoying but overall it works great
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Needs floor grips to keep in place
customer_reviews.text: The overall product works fine, but it would be better if it had floor grips on the bottom to keep it in place. It slides all over the place and the corners are always flipped up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: I had one that I loved from another brand with a similar look and price, so I got this one expecting it to be pretty much the same. It is not. The material is very thin and feels cheaply made. I do not expect it to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Choco

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to like about this mat? It covers a big area (for a little child) we have carpet and my baby loves rice. We use this mat to out under her table to avoid rice getting smushed into the carpet. We just folding up and dust it off into the sink or trash can. Super cute and super easy to clean up little messes
customer_reviews.author: Jay Say

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I like using this for playing on the floor or table with crayons or other items that are messy, but didn’t like it as an under the high chair mat, because it gets staticky, which makes the crumbs stick when you try to shake them off. Ends up being same amount of work as just sweeping up under the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Always_shopping

customer_reviews.title: Protects Floors from spills
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on time and in good condition. Is large enough to go under a small kids table which is great. Haven’t used it long but I could see getting rips in it eventually. It is a little thinner than I expected but overall good quality and looks exactly like the pictured item
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our toddler to use while snacking in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our toddler to use while snacking in the living room. It's a nice small size for him to sit on while watching tv and drinking his milk or snacking. Easy to fold up and take with you if needed. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Princess79

customer_reviews.title: Practical & does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean up after baby's meals and catches all the food droppings so we don't ruin our carpet :).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and it's easy to wipe down and fold. I thought it would be a little more like a plastic mat and less like a waterproof sheet. It slides around and isn't as durable as I expected. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not great :/
customer_reviews.text: Eh, I wasn’t a fan of this mat. It ripped really quick. Pretty much a square of flimsy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Serves a great purpose!
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this, I thought it felt sort of wimpy, but boy does it serve its purpose! It catches all the food and milk that my 1.5 year old drops. Great to protect floors. And cute rainbow pattern.
customer_reviews.author: HavetoWalk

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size for my infant in his high chair. I wash it everytime with his bibs and it comes out fresh and clean. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: YX

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy enough to clean off but I took off a ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it bc she loves Mickey. It’s easy enough to clean off but I took off a star bc it’s honestly a little hard to see the food on it sometimes. My mistake though - I went for cute instead of practical. I still like it though, and it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: We use this matt when we are traveling or visiting friends. It lets our little one eat (where there may not be a high chair) without making a mess of the floors. The size is great as its easy to fold and pack. It washes well; things I thought would stain came right out. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DHarris

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought months ago! Super light, waterproof, no smell, easy to wash and lay out to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Hjco88

customer_reviews.title: Though adequate in its use, this is not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Though adequate in its use, this is not as thick as I thought it would be. I had a prince lionheart catchall which was much more durable, I could even vacuum it!!! This one I feel will tear at any moment. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Deepti G.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat!! It’s perfect for under our daughter’s easel when she paints & we also love it for playing with kinetic sand! Easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a 1st bday party but will use daily. Very durable and helps keep my floor clean! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Saves our carpet
customer_reviews.text: Good radius to be under a highchair, everything my baby has dropped has fallen on the mat. Her spilled bottle has not leaked through (we have carpet in the dining room). And cutest cacti print ever!! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Made hubs happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested a splat mat to protect the carpet in our dining room. This one covers a big area and has prevented spills when baby drops a spoon or is done with other food items. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The perfect solution for underneath my son's high chair. Great and catching the food and not showing every crumb (so I can skip a day of sweeping)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Makes clean up easy for kiddos after dinner and helps to contain the mess. A must have for toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Cbakeman

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS THE FLOOR CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, store and catches lots of crumbs and food.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone who wants an east clean up
customer_reviews.text: Great size and easy to clean. Everyone with young kids needs this. Definitely can use as child grows for a variety of situations.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Miller

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: we paid $21 and it was NOT worth the price. Go to the dollar store and get a plastic tablecloth because at least those have the felt backing. This was just a cheap sheet of plastic, no backing at all. I felt that it was plenty big enough just disappointed at the actual material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So durable!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for more than a year -- and throw it in the washing machine once a week -- and it still looks brand new. So glad we spent the extra $$ and got this.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! I've used it under messy play, like sand, and under the highchair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Price increased, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mat its washable and dries quick but the seller keeps increasing the price, used to be $12 month ago when I purchase planned to get another one only to find out its selling for $17 now, good product but not worth that much, will skip it and find an alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Peter

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go under the little tikes table in my kitchen and it fits perfectly. The kids spill food all day long and it's easy to wipe up and not making a mess on my stone floor!
customer_reviews.author: Becky7777

product_meta.title: Bumkins Splat Mat, Waterproof, Washable for Floor or Table, Under Highchairs, Art, Crafts, Playtime 42x42 – Arrows
product_meta.description: Style:Bumkins| Color:ArrowOur splat mats have you covered! They’re made to protect your floors and tables from mealtime spills and playtime messes. Great for art projects – on or under tables. Made from the same easy-wipe waterproof and stain-resistant fabric as Bumkins award-winning SuperBib. The single-ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. A generous 42”x42” yet lightweight, it takes up less space in your bag, so you can take it where you need it! Wipeable and machine washable for easy cleaning so you can use it over and over again! Plus, it’s safe to use - BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free. Designed in Arizona, responsibly made in China.
feature_bullets: SAVING YOU FROM MESSES – Our splat mats have you covered! They’re made to protect your floors and tables from mealtime spills and playtime messes. Great for art and craft projects – on or under tables.
LONG-LASTING – Made from Bumkins' signature waterproof and stain-resistant fabric that’s both soft and strong. Tough enough for daily use, it stands up to messes.
LAB TESTED – At Bumkins, we take pride in our rigorous product testing to ensure you have the safest possible products. Our mats are BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free.
EASY-TO-CLEAN – Our fabric is stain-resistant, wipeable and machine washable. To extend the life of our splat mat, we recommend air drying the quick-dry fabric.
LOTS OF USES – Not just for underneath highchairs. Use it on floors, on tables or outside. Lightweight, it takes up less space in your bag, so you can take it where you need it!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,348 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
